entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 02 March 2023
